A container holding information for help displaying a situation on the view.

AnimationStateQueue - Class in animation
A complex data structure for helping the animator to queue animation states, so that the states can be allocated to the turns they were created in.
AnimationStateQueue() - Constructor for class animation.AnimationStateQueue
Initiates a new animation state queue.
Animator - Class in animation
Connects view and model by observing the model and creating information for representation on the gui.

Initiates an animator for a game that should be displayed on the gui.
